title: Brace Data Exchange JSON Specification
description: This schema describes the format for exchanging data with Brace Software for integrations with their loss mitigation system via API callback or file exchange.

unique_borrower_identifier.title: Unique Borrower Identifier
unique_borrower_identifier.description: A unique identifier, assigned by the servicer to identify the borrower. This is the primary key for this object.

primary_identifier.title: Primary Identifier
primary_identifier.description: A unique identifier for the underlying user. This optional field is used to pass the user's UI to process as part of data import.

borrower_position.title: Borrower Position
borrower_position.description: Used to associate income, expense, asset and credit score to the correct borrower. At least one borrower position must be reported. Income, assets, and expenses may be commingled and reported as Borrower Position 1, if not known at the borrower level, provided the borrower's occupancy status is the same.

last_four_of_ssn.title: Last Four of SSN
last_four_of_ssn.description: The last 4 digits of the borrower's SSN for identity verification purposes

ssn.title: SSN
ssn.description: The borrower's full SSN. This is required if the client wants to do Equifax credit pulls or when using non-SSO authentication for linking accounts to borrower records.

pull_credit.title: Pull Credit
pull_credit.description: This field can be used in combination with the (full) SSN to indicate that Brace should pull the borrower's credit report.

equifax_pull_date.title: Equifax Pull Date
equifax_pull_date.description: Date that the related credit score was pulled (if present)

experian_pull_date.title: Experian Pull Date
experian_pull_date.description: Date that the related credit score was pulled (if present)

transunion_pull_date.title: Transunion Pull Date
transunion_pull_date.description: Date that the related credit score was pulled (if present)

actively_seeking_work.title: Actively Seeking Work
actively_seeking_work.description: If unemployed, does the borrower attest that they are actively seeking work?

receiving_any_income.title: Receiving Any Income
receiving_any_income.description: Is the borrower receiving any income?

explanation_for_lack_of_income.title: Explanation for Lack of Income
explanation_for_lack_of_income.description: If borrower is not receiving any income, this field can be used for a free-form explanation of why.

number_of_months_paid.title: Number of Months Paid
number_of_months_paid.description: If borrower is a teacher, this field indicates the number of months of the year they are paid.

is_continuous.title: Is Continuous
is_continuous.description: Is the income continuous in nature? i.e. steady W-2 income

asset_type.title: Asset Type
asset_type.description: Indicates the type of asset this is.

expense_type.title: Expense Type
expense_type.description: Note that certain expenses are from credit bureau reports. These are handled differently for certain calculations. Namely: - AUTOLOAN - INSTALLMENTLOAN - LEASEPAYMENTS - PERSONALLOAN - REVOLVINGCHARGEACCOUNT - STUDENTLOAN - SUBJECTPROPERTYSUBORDINATEFINANCINGPANDI.

status_date.title: Status Date
status_date.description: Date that the Bankruptcy Status changed.

bankruptcy_reaffirmed.title: Bankruptcy Reaffirmed
bankruptcy_reaffirmed.description: Indicates whether a borrower has reaffirmed the mortgage loan following bankruptcy discharge.

bankruptcy_status.title: Bankruptcy Status
bankruptcy_status.description: Indicates the current status of the bankruptcy proceeding.

bankruptcy_type.title: Bankruptcy Type
bankruptcy_type.description: Indicates the chapter of the US Bankruptcy Code referenced in the bankruptcy filing.

active_duty_end_date.title: Active Duty End Date
active_duty_end_date.description: Date servicemember ended active duty. Can be left blank

active_duty_start_date.title: Active Duty Start Date
active_duty_start_date.description: Date servicemember began active duty. Can be left blank

unique_loan_identifier.title: Unique Loan Identifier
unique_loan_identifier.description: A unique identifier, assigned by the servicer to identify the loan. This is the primary key for this object.

brand_identifier.title: Brand Identifier
brand_identifier.description: An identifier that clients can use to specify special branding to be displayed in the context of this loan. For example, the value in this field could be used to display a logo, ie: Brand Identifier=123 would mean "look for the logo file named 123.png to display"

loan_product.title: Loan Product
loan_product.description: The product of the loan / the guidelines under which the loan was originated

application_status.title: Application Status
application_status.description: The status of the application in terms of the borrower's receipt, completion, and signing of all documents

application_status_date.title: Application Status Date
application_status_date.description: The date of the last Application Status change

sor_application_date.title: SOR Application Date
sor_application_date.description: This field allows the servicer to control the start date against which we calculate number of days before timing out the borrower's application

sor_application_id.title: SOR Application ID
sor_application_id.description: This field can be used for the servicer to pass through their own notion of a unique identifier for the currently open application for loss mitigation.

third_party_authorized_to_speak.title: Third Party Authorized to Speak
third_party_authorized_to_speak.description: Are the borrowers working with a third party that's authorized to speak on their behalf during the modification review process?

third_party_name.title: Third Party Name
third_party_name.description: Name of authorized third party representative.

third_party_phone_number.title: Third Party Phone Number
third_party_phone_number.description: Phone number of authorized third party representative.

third_party_email_address.title: Third Party Email Address
third_party_email_address.description: Email of authorized third party representative.

actual_payment_effective_date.title: Actual Payment Effective Date
actual_payment_effective_date.description: Payment Effective Date of the modified loan. This variant is the servicer-provided actual Modification Effective Date of the final loan modification. This is servicer-provided for workout evaluation.

arm_ceiling.title: ARM Ceiling
arm_ceiling.description: Maximum interest rate for an ARM or Step Rate Loan

arm_floor.title: ARM Floor
arm_floor.description: The minimum interest rate for an ARM or Step Rate Loan

arm_index.title: ARM Index
arm_index.description: The index for an ARM loan

arm_margin.title: ARM Margin
arm_margin.description: The margin for an ARM loan

lien_position.title: Lien Position
lien_position.description: Position of the lien. If this is not provided, the loan will be handled as a First Position loan.

second_lien_upb.title: Second Lien UPB
second_lien_upb.description: The UPB of any second liens

servicing_fee.title: Servicing Fee
servicing_fee.description: Monthly servicing fee received on the loan

subordinate_lien_holder_name.title: Subordinate Lien Holder Name
subordinate_lien_holder_name.description: The name of the company which holds the second lien

total_payments_received_before_modificat.title: Total Payments Received before Modification
total_payments_received_before_modificat.description: Total monthly payment received since origination

trial_period_interest_amount.title: Trial Period Interest Amount
trial_period_interest_amount.description: Interest portion of all contractual payments applied during the trial period.

bring_current_total_due.title: Bring Current Total Due
bring_current_total_due.description: Total amount of PITI to reinstate the loan, a.k.a. "total arrearage" amount

delinquency_debt_to_income_ratio.title: Delinquency Debt to Income Ratio
delinquency_debt_to_income_ratio.description: Up Front Housing Ratio as calculated during delinquency

escrow_school_taxes.title: Escrow School Taxes
escrow_school_taxes.description: Amount of monthly escrowed school taxes

incentive_fee.title: Incentive Fee
incentive_fee.description: Any fee received from an investor for completed loss mitigation programs

initial_partial_claim_date_of_default.title: Initial partial claim date of default
initial_partial_claim_date_of_default.description: Date of default from borrower's first partial claim.

loan_is_in_litigation.title: Loan Is In Litigation
loan_is_in_litigation.description: Indicates if the loan is in litigation

loan_is_in_recourse.title: Loan Is In Recourse
loan_is_in_recourse.description: Indicates if the loan is in recourse

loan_is_leasehold_estate.title: Loan Is Leasehold Estate
loan_is_leasehold_estate.description: Indicates if the loan is a leasehold estate

loan_is_subject_to_indemnification.title: Loan Is Subject To Indemnification
loan_is_subject_to_indemnification.description: Indicates if the loan is subject to indemnification

number_of_full_payments_made.title: Number of full payments made
number_of_full_payments_made.description: The number of full mortgage payments paid on the current loan.

previous_partial_claim_amounts.title: Previous partial claim amounts
previous_partial_claim_amounts.description: Sum of prior partial claim amounts.

suspense_balance_amount.title: Suspense Balance Amount
suspense_balance_amount.description: This represents partial mortgage payments made by the borrower that the servicer is holding in suspense. This includes any funds that are currently unapplied in the borrower's account. Do not include any amounts that are specifically flagged not to be applied to contractual payments, e.g. foreclosure fees and costs. Any value provided request file will be echoed back in the response file.

loan_is_subject_to_mediation.title: Loan Is Subject To Mediation
loan_is_subject_to_mediation.description: Indicates if the loan is subject to mediation

processing_month_indicator.title: Processing Month Indicator
processing_month_indicator.description: Indicates if the servicer intends to use a Processing Month for purposes of Payment Deferral evaluation (SMDU only).

escrow_prohibited_by_law_indicator.title: Processing Month Indicator
escrow_prohibited_by_law_indicator.description: Identifies escrow collection is prohibited by applicable law.

estimated_mortgage_insurance_proceeds.title: Estimated Mortgage Insurance Proceeds
estimated_mortgage_insurance_proceeds.description: The estimated amount of the mortgage insurance proceeds.

escrowed_association_dues_indicator.title: Escrowed Association Dues Indicator
escrowed_association_dues_indicator.description: Indicates that a borrower's Association or HOA dues will be escrowed by the servicer after the workout.

expected_before_trial_payment_amount.title: Expected Before Trial Payment Amount
expected_before_trial_payment_amount.description: The amount that the servicer expects the borrower to pay between loss mit evaluation and the start of the workout.

escrow_shortfall_payback_duration.title: Escrow Shortfall Paymen Duration
escrow_shortfall_payback_duration.description: The duration, in months, over which the servicer will collect the Escrow Shortfall amount.

most_recent_unrelated_mortgage_closing.title: Escrow Shortfall Paymen Duration
most_recent_unrelated_mortgage_closing.description: The most recent mortgage closing unrelated to the mortgage being evaluated. This is discovered by looking through a credit report.

brp_is_complete.title: BRP Is Complete
brp_is_complete.description: The Borrower Response Package for the loan has been deemed complete by the servicer.

task_age.title: Task Age
task_age.description: Task age (in days) for loss mitigation task

unique_workout_identifier.title: Unique Workout Identifier
unique_workout_identifier.description: A unique identifier, assigned by the servicer to identify the workout.

amount_of_principal_balance_forgiveness.title: Amount of Principal Balance Forgiveness
amount_of_principal_balance_forgiveness.description: Indicates if there is any principal balance forgiveness as a result of a workout

disaster_name.title: Disaster Name
disaster_name.description: Name of the disaster involved with this workout.

disaster_type.title: Disaster Type
disaster_type.description: Type of agency (federal, executive, or state) declaring the disaster that was the impetus for workout.

fema_disaster_number.title: FEMA Disaster Number
fema_disaster_number.description: Disaster number. Only the numeric portion is acceptable (e.g. 4482 for the disaster "DR-4482")

forbearance_period.title: Forbearance Period
forbearance_period.description: The number of months the borrower has been in forbearance.

forbearance_start_date.title: Forbearance Start Date
forbearance_start_date.description: Start date of the forbearance period.

forbearance_end_date.title: Forbearance End Date
forbearance_end_date.description: End date of the forbearance period.

first_trial_payment_due_date.title: First Trial Payment Due Date
first_trial_payment_due_date.description: This is the date that the first trial payment is due. If the servicer provides this value for a trial request, it must be greater than the current date. We will use the servicer provided value in its trial evaluation. If the servicer does not provide this value for a trial request, we will set the 1st Trial Payment Due Date based on the current date. The value used in the evaluation will be provided in the response file. If the current date is prior to the 16th of the month, the 1st Trial Payment Due Date will be the first of the next month. If the current date is the 16th of the month or later, the 1st Trial Payment Due Date will be the first of the following month. (Example: April 3 = May 1; April 27 = June 1). The 1st Trial Payment Due Date must be provided on a Final-Structuring Request.

modified_loan_term.title: Modified Loan Term
modified_loan_term.description: New loan term resulting from a modification, in months

modified_maturity_date.title: Modified Maturity Date
modified_maturity_date.description: New maturity date resulting from a modification

modified_principal_amount.title: Modified Principal Amount
modified_principal_amount.description: New UPB resulting from a modification

number_of_trial_payments.title: Number of Trial Payments
number_of_trial_payments.description: Number of trial payments due for a modification

payment_reduction_percent.title: Payment Reduction Percent
payment_reduction_percent.description: If the prior modification provided a reduction of the borrower's pre-workout monthly payment (PITIAS), provide the amount of payment reduction, expressed as a percentage. Report this data field regardless of whether or not the workout was completed by the borrower.

post_modification_dti.title: Post Modification DTI
post_modification_dti.description: New front end ratio resulting from a modification

trial_eligibility_date.title: Trial Eligibility Date
trial_eligibility_date.description: Date of positive eligibility determination for the trial that was committed to the borrower.

trial_modification_payment.title: Trial Modification Payment
trial_modification_payment.description: Cash flow payments and dates required to receive trial payment plan payments

trial_payment_amount.title: Trial Payment Amount
trial_payment_amount.description: Amount to be received for each trial payment

trial_payment_remaining_amount.title: Trial Payment Remaining Amount
trial_payment_remaining_amount.description: Total of all remaining trial period payments expected to be collected from the borrower prior to the end of the trial period.

workout_type.title: Workout Type
workout_type.description: See the "Workout Types" sheet. Specifying a workout type that does not exist for the investor on the loan is an error.

hardship_type.title: Hardship Type
hardship_type.description: All hardships communicated by the borrower (verified or unverified).

other_description.title: Other Description
other_description.description: If Hardship Type is OTHER, then this is a related free-form description

disaster_name.title: Disaster Name
disaster_name.description: Name of the designated FEMA disaster.

fema_disaster_number.title: FEMA Disaster Number
fema_disaster_number.description: Disaster number. Only the numeric portion is acceptable (e.g. 4482 for the disaster 'DR-4482'). (If a disaster name is supplied then this is required.)

hardship_start_date.title: Hardship Start Date
hardship_start_date.description: The start date of the hardship

hardship_end_date.title: Hardship End Date
hardship_end_date.description: The end date of the hardship, if the hardship has ended

length_of_hardship.title: Length of hardship
length_of_hardship.description: Length of hardship. (*) This is only required if we cannot derive it from the HardshipType. For example: - REDUCTION_IN_INCOME is always SHORT_TERM_TEMPORARY - DEATH_OF_BORROWER_WAGE_EARNER is PERMANENT - OTHER can be any length and it is up to the servicer to approve the documentation. Please see the "Hardship Matrix" sheet for more details.

verified_gross_continuous_income_prior_t.title: Verified gross continuous income prior to PDMDA

attorney_fees.title: Attorney Fees
attorney_fees.description: Total outstanding attorney fees, a.k.a. "FCL Attorney Fees" * Capitalizable

corporate_advance.title: Corporate Advance
corporate_advance.description: Total amount advanced for services provided on a loan (recoverable advances) * Capitalizable

escrow_shortfall.title: Escrow Shortfall
escrow_shortfall.description: Monthly escrow shortfall from last escrow analysis

escrow_shortfall_2nd_home.title: Escrow Shortfall 2nd Home
escrow_shortfall_2nd_home.description: Monthly escrow shortfall from last escrow analysis for 2nd home

escrow_shortfall_investment.title: Escrow Shortfall Investment
escrow_shortfall_investment.description: Monthly escrow shortfall from last escrow analysis for investment

escrow_tax_amount.title: Escrow Tax Amount
escrow_tax_amount.description: Amount of monthly escrowed tax amount

escrow_tax_amount_2nd_home.title: Escrow Tax Amount 2nd Home
escrow_tax_amount_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed tax amount, 2nd home

escrow_tax_amount_investment.title: Escrow Tax Amount Investment
escrow_tax_amount_investment.description: Amount of monthly escrowed tax amount, Investment

ground_rent_monthly_amount_2nd_home.title: Ground Rent Monthly Amount 2nd Home
ground_rent_monthly_amount_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly ground rent, 2nd home

ground_rent_monthly_amount_investment.title: Ground Rent Monthly Amount Investment
ground_rent_monthly_amount_investment.description: Amount of monthly ground rent, investment

loan_current_escrow_advance_amount.title: Loan Current Escrow Advance Amount
loan_current_escrow_advance_amount.description: Escrow advances paid by the servicer prior to the workout effective date, used only for COVID-19 and PDD options.

calculated_payment_effective_date.title: Calculated Payment Effective Date
calculated_payment_effective_date.description: For Trial Modifications, this is calculated and is the first day of the month following the month when the last trial payment is due.

estimated_hazard_insurance_proceeds.title: Estimated Hazard Insurance Proceeds
estimated_hazard_insurance_proceeds.description: The estimated amount of the hazard and/or flood insurance proceeds.

loan_pre-workout_interest_rate.title: Loan Pre-Workout Interest Rate
loan_pre-workout_interest_rate.description: The current contractual interest rate at the time of program eligibility determination. This value is not determined by or related to the Last Paid Installment Date.

loan_pre-workout_unpaid_principal_balanc.title: Loan Pre-Workout Unpaid Principal Balance Amount
loan_pre-workout_unpaid_principal_balanc.description: The unpaid principal balance of a loan, as recorded in the servicing system at the time of loan evaluation. Does not include any existing forbearance amount.

loan_remaining_term.title: Loan Remaining Term
loan_remaining_term.description: Scheduled remaining term of the loan in months. Equivalent to the amortization term minus the time since the first payment after origination, regardless of months delinquent. Example: First payment date for a 360-month term loan was 5/1/16. The current evaluation date 4/30/17. Remaining term for this loan is 348 (360-12).

loan_type.title: Loan Type
loan_type.description: Type of loan (e.g. FRM is a fixed-rate loan and covers all terms, 30yr, 15yr, etc.)

maximum_arm_rate.title: Maximum ARM Rate
maximum_arm_rate.description: The maximum ARM rate for this loan, if it is an ARM rate loan

maximum_step_rate.title: Maximum Step Rate
maximum_step_rate.description: The maximum step rate for this loan, if it is a step rate loan

monthly_mortgage_insurance_pre-workout_a.title: Monthly Mortgage Insurance Pre-Workout Amount
monthly_mortgage_insurance_pre-workout_a.description: The borrower's monthly payment for private mortgage insurance, pre-workout. The pre-workout monthly mortgage insurance payment amount. In the scenario where Lender Paid MI (LPMI) is converted to Borrower Paid MI the amounts could be different pre- and post-workout.

next_arm_reset_date.title: Next ARM Reset Date
next_arm_reset_date.description: For ARM loans, the date the payment that reflects the next contractual ARM interest rate reset is due.  For fixed-rate interest-only loans where the loan is still in the interest-only period, the date the first payment is due based on when the loan will begin to amortize. For step-rate loans where the loan has reached the last step period, report the date the payment became due that reflects the last step rate increase. The reported date should always be a future date, unless the loan was a step-rate loan and the last step period was reached or if the Interest Only period has ended. For ARMs and Step Rate loans, this value is not determined by or related to the Last Paid Installment Date. Do not provide an Interest Only end date if the loan's due date is on or after the day the loan became fully amortizing.

next_arm_reset_rate.title: Next ARM Reset Rate
next_arm_reset_rate.description: The expected contractual interest rate on an ARM loan at the next ARM reset date given the reset date is within the next 120 days. Use the latest available reset rate at the time of submission. If the reset date is outside of 120 days, or for fixed-rate interest-only loans, where the loan is still in the interest-only period, report the Loan Pre-Workout Interest Rate in this field. This value is not determined by or related to the Last Paid Installment Date. For Interest Only Loans, if the Interest Only period has ended after the next contractual payment due date provided but before the current submission date, the Next ARM Reset Rate should still be provided. Report all percentages in standard format (e.g. 5.125% should be sent as 5.125)

previous_arm_reset_date.title: Previous ARM Reset Date
previous_arm_reset_date.description: For ARM loans, the previous date the payment that reflects the contractual ARM interest rate reset. For ARM loans where the loan is still in the interest-only period, use the date where the first payment is due (i.e. 10/1 ARM where Next Adjustment Date is 1/1/2026, use First Paid Installment- 1/1/2016). For step-rate loans where the loan has reached the last step period, report the date the payment became due that reflects the last step rate increase. The reported date should always be a previous date.

previous_arm_reset_rate.title: Previous ARM Reset Rate
previous_arm_reset_rate.description: The contractual interest rate on an ARM loan at the previous ARM reset date.

original_maturity_date.title: Original Maturity Date
original_maturity_date.description: The date on which the mortgage obligation is scheduled to be paid off, according to the mortgage note or modification agreement.

promissory_note_amount.title: Promissory Note Amount
promissory_note_amount.description: The total amount of the Promissory Note being given by the borrower(s). Required. Note at origination.

promissory_note_first_payment_due_date.title: Promissory Note First Payment Due Date
promissory_note_first_payment_due_date.description: The date on which the first payment on the original balance of the promissory note is due from the borrower.

promissory_note_monthly_payment_amount.title: Promissory Note Monthly Payment Amount
promissory_note_monthly_payment_amount.description: The total monthly payment under the terms of the Promissory Note.

promissory_note_term.title: Promissory Note Term
promissory_note_term.description: The term of the Promissory Note in months.

mi_mip_monthly_amount.title: MI/MIP Monthly Amount
mi_mip_monthly_amount.description: Amount of monthly escrowed MI or MIP

mi_mip_monthly_amount_2nd_home.title: MI/MIP Monthly Amount 2nd Home
mi_mip_monthly_amount_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed MI or MIP, 2nd home

mi_mip_monthly_amount_investment.title: MI/MIP Monthly Amount Investment
mi_mip_monthly_amount_investment.description: Amount of monthly escrowed MI or MIP, investment

original_mortgage_note_date.title: Original Mortgage Note Date
original_mortgage_note_date.description: The date the mortgage note was signed.

contractual_payment_due_date.title: Contractual Payment Due Date
contractual_payment_due_date.description: Date of a scheduled contractual mortgage payment. A date must be reported for each Contractual Payment Amount. Dates must be unique and sequential.

contractual_payment_amount.title: Contractual Payment Amount
contractual_payment_amount.description: Payment amount of a scheduled contractual mortgage payment. Must include any monthly mortgage insurance payment amount; must not include late fees. This amount should reflect the payment that will be required in order to advance the borrower's LPI date. It should exclude any late fees.

interest_payment_amount.title: Interest Payment Amount
interest_payment_amount.description: Interest amount associated with a scheduled contractual mortgage payment.

principal_payment_amount.title: Principal Payment Amount
principal_payment_amount.description: Principal amount associated with a scheduled contractual mortgage payment. If loan is interest only (IO), and in the IO period, send zero as principal amount for LPI+1.

p_i_payment.title: P&I payment
p_i_payment.description: Loan Principal and Interest. This is only for the purpose of QC: this field is compared against "Interest Payment Amount" and "Principal Payment Amount" to ensure equality.

p_i_payment_for_2nd_home.title: P&I payment for 2nd home
p_i_payment_for_2nd_home.description: Principal and Interest for 2nd home. Used in certain situations, e.g. Flex Mod on a 2nd home

p_i_payment_for_investment.title: P&I payment for Investment
p_i_payment_for_investment.description: Principal and Interest for Investment property. Used in certain situations, e.g. Flex Mod on a investment property

accrued_late_fee_penalty.title: Accrued Late Fee Penalty
accrued_late_fee_penalty.description: Expenses resulting from the borrower's failure to make timely mortgage payments. Reported amounts will be included in Repayment Plan analysis, but will not be included in modification analysis. Attorney fees, property preservation expenses and inspection fees should not be commingled in the reported amount. * Capitalizable

delinquent_interest_amount.title: Delinquent Interest Amount
delinquent_interest_amount.description: Delinquent interest for interest capitalization. It is the amount of delinquent interest from the loan's expected final LPI date prior to the loan workout until one month prior to the Loan Workout Effective Date.

delinquent_interest_through_submission_d.title: Delinquent Interest Through Submission Date Amount
delinquent_interest_through_submission_d.description: The Amount of delinquent interest from the LPI date through the end of the proceeding month. This is delinquent interest as of the date of evaluation.

foreclosure_status.title: Foreclosure Status
foreclosure_status.description: Indicates where this delinquency is in the foreclosure process. In other words, during the life of the foreclosure process there are stages of completion - the foreclosure status indicates what stage the foreclosure process is currently in. If the loan is in active foreclosure, report the most recent status.

last_paid_installment_date.title: Last Paid Installment Date
last_paid_installment_date.description: Date of current last paid installment on servicing system at the time of the call. This is sourced from an MSP system.

loan_foreclosure_sale_date.title: Loan Foreclosure Sale Date
loan_foreclosure_sale_date.description: The projected or actual date the property went to foreclosure sale at public auction.

loan_foreclosure_sale_date_type.title: Loan Foreclosure Sale Date Type
loan_foreclosure_sale_date_type.description: Indicates if a future foreclosure sale date is estimated or scheduled for sale at public auction.

number_of_consecutive_payments_on_rollin.title: Number of Consecutive Payments On Rolling Delinquency
number_of_consecutive_payments_on_rollin.description: Number of consecutive monthly contractual payments that have been made on the loan during a rolling delinquency.

consecutive_delinquent_months_count.title: Consecutive Delinquent Months Count
consecutive_delinquent_months_count.description: The Number of months the loan has been consecutively delinquent as of the due date without a change in the level of delinquency.

number_of_times_30_days_delinquent_in_6_.title: Number Of Times 30 Days Delinquent In 6 Months
number_of_times_30_days_delinquent_in_6_.description: This is the number of times a borrower has been 30 days delinquent in the previous six months preceding the month of evaluation.

principal_deferment.title: Principal deferment
principal_deferment.description: The reduction of a portion of principal which is then tacked onto the balloon payment.

rolling_30_day_delinquencies.title: Rolling 30 day delinquencies
rolling_30_day_delinquencies.description: Loan has two or more 30-day delinquencies in the most recent 6-month period

effective_as_of.title: Effective As Of
effective_as_of.description: The effective date of the workout's state. Must be unique for a given workout.

description.title: Description
description.description: If the workout was not completed by the borrower, the reason the particular workout type reported by the servicer was not successful. Other free-form text can be placed here.

workout_event.title: Workout Event
workout_event.description: The event that caused the workout to assume its current state. Workouts are restricted in their state transition. The allowable before and after states and the event that allowed the transition are restricted to the tuples in the "Workout Transitions" sheet.

workout_state.title: Workout State
workout_state.description: State of the workout. Internal documentation at Brace > Feature Requests > Workouts

unique_property_identifier.title: Unique Property Identifier
unique_property_identifier.description: A unique identifier assigned by the servicer to identify the property. This is the primary key for this object.

association_dues.title: Association Dues
association_dues.description: Amount of any monthly association dues

association_dues_2nd_home.title: Association Dues 2nd Home
association_dues_2nd_home.description: Amount of any monthly association dues, 2nd home

association_dues_investment.title: Association Dues Investment
association_dues_investment.description: Amount of any monthly association dues, investment property

avm_date.title: AVM Date
avm_date.description: Date of the most recent AVM

avm_value.title: AVM Value
avm_value.description: Value of the most recent AVM

bpo_date.title: BPO Date
bpo_date.description: Date of the most recent BPO

bpo_value.title: BPO Value
bpo_value.description: Value of the most recent BPO

capitalizable_repair_cost.title: Capitalizable Repair Cost
capitalizable_repair_cost.description: The cost of repairs required to bring the property to good and habitable condition. Collected through an internal property inspection in the last 90 days. (Capitalizable only during a disaster scenario)

cash_contribution_prohibited.title: Cash contribution prohibited
cash_contribution_prohibited.description: Cash contribution prohibited by state law. Affects certain workouts, notably DIL.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: A code denoting the condition of the subject property. This field is only mandatory for liquidations.

current_loan_to_value_percent.title: Current Loan to Value Percent
current_loan_to_value_percent.description: Front end and back end expense ratios

environmental_problems.title: Environmental Problems
environmental_problems.description: The property has problems that are environmental in nature (e.g. black mold.)

number_of_units.title: Number of Units
number_of_units.description: Actual number of units in the property.

occupancy_status.title: Occupancy Status
occupancy_status.description: A code identifying the current occupancy status of the subject property.

property_address_2.title: Property Address 2
property_address_2.description: Second part of property address, apartment/unit/floor number

property_city.title: Property City
property_city.description: City in which the property securing the loan is located.

property_disposition.title: Property Disposition
property_disposition.description: Indicates the borrower's intention to remain in the property.

property_state.title: Property State
property_state.description: The 2-character postal abbreviation of the state, province, or region of the subject property.

property_type.title: Property Type
property_type.description: A code that defines the type of property that the loan is associated with.

property_zip_code.title: Property Zip Code
property_zip_code.description: The code designated by the postal service to direct the delivery of physical mail or which corresponds to a physical location. In the USA, this can take either a 5 digit form (ZIP Code) or a 9-digit form (ZIP + 4). TRUNCATE the zip code to allow only first 5 digits while sending to NPV or deriving the ZIP Code Eligibility Type

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: A code identifying the intended use by the borrower of the subject property.

usage_at_origination.title: Usage At Origination
usage_at_origination.description: See "Usage". This was the usage of the property at origination. Required for FHLMC Streamlined Short Sale

preservation_costs_and_fees.title: Preservation Costs and Fees
preservation_costs_and_fees.description: The cost of repairs required to bring the property to good and habitable condition. Collected through an internal property inspection in the last 90 days. * Capitalizable

inspection_fee_balance.title: Inspection Fee Balance
inspection_fee_balance.description: Total fee balance resulting from inspections * Capitalizable

number_of_people_in_household.title: Number of People in Household
number_of_people_in_household.description: Number of people in the household

as_is_value.title: As Is Value
as_is_value.description: For the chosen "Valuation Type", this is the as-is value of the property. Only relevant if a "Valuation Type" is provided.

valuation_date.title: Valuation Date
valuation_date.description: If this is blank, then a valuation record cannot be created within the Brace database.

valuation_type.title: Valuation Type
valuation_type.description: This is the type of property valuation. It should be paired with a value in "As Is Value". If this is blank, then a valuation type record cannot be created within the Brace database.

litigation_description_type.title: Litigation Description Type
litigation_description_type.description: Describes the type of litigation affecting the property or the borrower's ability to repay the debt.

litigation_status_date.title: Litigation Status Date
litigation_status_date.description: The date of the status of the reported litigation.

litigation_subject_property_indicator.title: Litigation Subject Property Indicator
litigation_subject_property_indicator.description: Identifies if the litigation affects the subject property.

litigation_title_conveyance_limitation_i.title: Litigation Title Conveyance Limitation Indicator
litigation_title_conveyance_limitation_i.description: Identifies if the litigation affects the title or limits valid conveyance of the property.

litigation_status_type.title: Litigation Status Type
litigation_status_type.description: The current status of the reported litigation.

date_property_marketed.title: Date property marketed
date_property_marketed.description: The property must be marketed (i.e. offered for sale) prior to using the DIL option. *If this is blank, then a property listing record cannot be created within the Brace database.

listed_for_sale.title: Listed for Sale
listed_for_sale.description: Is the property currently listed for sale?

listing_price.title: Listing Price
listing_price.description: Listed sale price of the property.

listing_agent_name.title: Listing Agent Name
listing_agent_name.description: Name of the listing agent if property is currently listed

listing_agent_phone_number.title: Listing Agent Phone Number
listing_agent_phone_number.description: Phone number of listing agent if property is currently listed

net_sales_proceeds_amount.title: Net Sales Proceeds Amount
net_sales_proceeds_amount.description: The estimated or actual net sales proceeds to the borrower if the purchase offer is accepted.

purchase_offer_amount.title: Purchase Offer Amount
purchase_offer_amount.description: The gross purchase offer amount received by the servicer for the subject property.

purchase_offer_closing_date.title: Purchase Offer Closing Date
purchase_offer_closing_date.description: The closing date referenced in the purchase offer the servicer received for consideration on the subject property.

purchase_offer_received_date.title: Purchase Offer Received Date
purchase_offer_received_date.description: Date the servicer received a purchase offer on the subject property for consideration. The offer may result in borrower sales proceeds that are less than the full amount of indebtedness. * If this is blank, then a purchase offer record cannot be created within the Brace database.

purchase_offer_accepted_date.title: Purchase Offer Accepted Date
purchase_offer_accepted_date.description: Date the borrower accepted a purchase offer

escrow_earthquake_insurance.description: Amount of monthly escrowed earthquake insurance for primary residence

escrow_earthquake_insurance_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed earthquake insurance for 2nd home

escrow_fire_insurance_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed fire insurance for 2nd home

escrow_fire_insurance_investment.title: Escrow Fire Insurance Investment
escrow_fire_insurance_investment.description: Amount of monthly escrowed fire insurance for investment

escrow_flood_insurance.title: Escrow Flood Insurance
escrow_flood_insurance.description: Amount of monthly escrowed flood insurance for primary residence.

escrow_flood_insurance_2nd_home.title: Escrow Flood Insurance 2nd Home
escrow_flood_insurance_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed flood insurance for 2nd home.

escrow_flood_insurance_investment.title: Escrow Flood Insurance Investment
escrow_flood_insurance_investment.description: Amount of monthly escrowed flood insurance for investment.

escrow_lava_insurance.title: Escrow Lava Insurance
escrow_lava_insurance.description: Amount of monthly escrowed lava insurance for primary residence

escrow_lava_insurance_2nd_home.title: Escrow Lava Insurance 2nd Home
escrow_lava_insurance_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed lava insurance for 2nd home

escrow_lava_insurance_investment.title: Escrow Lava Insurance Investment
escrow_lava_insurance_investment.description: Amount of monthly escrowed lava insurance for investment

escrow_property_insurance.title: Escrow Property Insurance
escrow_property_insurance.description: Amount of monthly escrowed property insurance.

escrow_property_insurance_2nd_home.title: Escrow Property Insurance 2nd Home
escrow_property_insurance_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed property insurance. For the 2nd home.

escrow_property_insurance_investment.title: Escrow Property Insurance Investment
escrow_property_insurance_investment.description: Amount of monthly escrowed property insurance. For an investment property.

escrow_wind_storm_insurance.title: Escrow Wind Storm Insurance
escrow_wind_storm_insurance.description: Amount of monthly escrowed windstorm insurance for primary residence

escrow_wind_storm_insurance_2nd_home.title: Escrow Wind Storm Insurance 2nd Home
escrow_wind_storm_insurance_2nd_home.description: Amount of monthly escrowed windstorm insurance for 2nd home

escrow_wind_storm_insurance_investment.title: Escrow Wind Storm Insurance Investment
escrow_wind_storm_insurance_investment.description: Amount of monthly escrowed windstorm insurance for investment
